name: Vision Challenge
description:
This game was made for the University of Europe for Applied Science in Berlin with instruction from Professor Csongor Baranyai by Naru. 

An educational game with the intention to be an educational game with a competitive twist. It's inspired by the Ishihara Test, a test performed to test Color Blindness.

This game is a part of the game-a-week course with the theme of "10 Seconds".
